div.p: Aurelii Ptollas and Atisis, sitologoi likewise apaitetai of the villagers of the village of Karanis, to Aurelius Antiouris son of Ptollas, greeting. I have received from you for (your obligation of) the tenth (10th) indiction for sea freight, fifty-six talents (tal. 56), total. (2nd hand) I, Aurelius Melas, wrote for him because he is illiterate. Translation: N. Lewis, P.NYU 1 3
